title: Amazon Essentials Men's Sweatshirt, Mock Neck, Fleece Zip Up
description: REGULAR FIT: Experience superior comfort with this men's zip-up sweatshirt, designed for a relaxed fit through the shoulders, chest, and waist
SOFT BRUSHED FLEECE: Stay warm and cozy in this midweight sweatshirt for men crafted from a soft, brushed-back cotton-polyester blend fleece
VERSATILE EVERYDAY STYLE: This essentials sweatshirt is a versatile wardrobe staple. Pair it with joggers or jeans for everyday casual looks suitable for various occasions
PRACTICAL DESIGN DETAILS: Features a full-length front zipper, mock neck collar, and ribbed cuffs. This men sweatshirts style includes two front hand pockets
LENGTH: 28" from side neck on US size M.

Cut from a soft, brushed-back cotton-polyester blend fleece, this midweight sweatshirt is well-suited for keeping you cozy and warm on cooler days. Tailored for everyday casual styling, this full-zip mock-neck sweatshirt pairs nicely with Amazon Essentials Men's fleece joggers, providing a relaxed yet stylish look that’s ideal for leisurely outings or casual wear. The thoughtful details include a full-length front zipper, a mock neck collar, rib trim at the cuffs, and two front hand pockets for added functionality and convenience. Measuring 28 inches from the side neck on a US size M, it offers ample coverage and a sleek silhouette. We value customer feedback and continually refine our designs to ensure our clothes meet the highest standards of comfort, quality, and longevity, all at prices that are affordable for the whole family
